name: slamscan
description: Use lambda to scan s3 files on upload. S3 LAMbda clamSCAN

scripts.cover: yarn run cover:actual; yarn run cover:collect
scripts.cover:actual: yarn run cover:gulp && yarn run cover:sls
scripts.cover:gulp: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=test SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH:=$(which clamscan)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH:=$(which freshclam)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH:=$PWD/build/etc/freshclam.conf} nyc --temp-dir .nyc_output-gulp gulp -LLLL --color test
scripts.cover:sls: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=test SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH:=$(which clamscan)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH:=$(which freshclam)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH:=$PWD/build/etc/freshclam.conf} nyc --temp-dir .nyc_output-sls sls invoke test --path test/sls
scripts.prepare: npm run snyk-protect && yarn run snyk-protect
scripts.test:actual: yarn run test:actual:gulp && yarn run test:actual:sls
scripts.test:actual:gulp: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=test SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH:=$(which clamscan)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH:=$(which freshclam)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH:=$PWD/build/etc/freshclam.conf} gulp -LLLL --color test
scripts.test:actual:sls: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=test SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_CLAMSCAN_BINARY_PATH:=$(which clamscan)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_BINARY_PATH:=$(which freshclam)} SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH=${SLAMSCAN_FRESHCLAM_CONFIG_PATH:=$PWD/build/etc/freshclam.conf} sls invoke test --path test/sls --compilers js:./babel.register.js
